name: romanized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
similar to or typical of ancient Roman styles, beliefs, customs, etc.: The new province of Dacia became one of the most highly romanized of the empire. The "Bust of a Young Gaul" shows a Romanized young man in a toga. Synonym
Latinized
(of a church or church organization) made Roman Catholic or more like the Roman Catholic church: This particular group of missionaries preached a Romanised version of Christianity that emphasized participation in the sacramental life of the Church.
written in Roman script (= a writing system based on the Latin alphabet): Romanized versions exist for several alphabetic systems, such as Arabic and Hindi. The system automatically converts Chinese characters into their equivalent romanized form. Compare
Latinized
